:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 SURFboard Wi-Fi Router}}
''with RipCurrent G.hn Technology'' :{{ProductPage|http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac1900p/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Arris|p=a0ha000000REKViAAP}} * Web GUI: http://mysurfboard.local "ARRIS", "SBR-AC3200P/AC1900P", "BDV00N0D-1.0" and "PALWONN" :is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2790306 FCC photos] (OEM [[SerComm]]). ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32997-arris-sbrac1900p-surfboard-wifi-router-with-ripcurrent-g-hn-technology-reviewed ''Arris SBR-AC1900P SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent G.hn Technology
Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===See also=== *[[Arris SBR-AC3200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac3200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC3200P UIDSBR-AC3200P] (2015-10-29) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6IY B01E3VN6IY] (300$) *[[Arris SBR-AC1900P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac1900p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC1900P UIDSBR-AC1900P] (2015-10-22) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6E8 B01E3VN6E8] (200$) *[[Arris SBR-AC1200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac1200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC1200P UIDSBR-AC1200P] (2015-12-18) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6H0 B01E3VN6H0] (120$) *[[Arris SBX-AC1200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Hotspot with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbx-ac1200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBX-AC1200P UIDSBX-AC1200P] (2015-12-23) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN7VA B01E3VN7VA] (100$) *[[Arris SBX-1000P]] - ''SURFboard Wired Network Extender with RipCurrent'' :Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6DO B01E3VN6DO] (60$) • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbx-1000p/ PPage] __NOTOC__
